DOC.brief_title: 2010-2011 Trivalent Influenza Vaccine ( TIV ) Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Influenza significant cause morbidity mortality United States . Pregnant woman infant increase risk complication influenza . Pregnant woman consider high risk population . In United States , routine vaccination inactivate trivalent influenza vaccine ( TIV ) woman pregnant deliver influenza season recommend . However , study exist safety immunogenicity administration seasonal inactivated TIV . Although influenza vaccination recommend pregnancy , rate immunization remain low , 13 percent , partly reflect concern safety among pregnant woman provider . It important gather prospective data safety immunogenicity inactivate TIV vaccine pregnant woman . This multi-site randomized , double-blinded clinical trial 180 healthy 18-39 year old , pregnant woman second third trimester pregnancy ( 14 week gestation 33 weeks/6 day gestation , inclusive ) 60 healthy 18-39 year old non-pregnant control . Study subject randomize 1:1:1 receive one follow three 2010-2011 seasonal inactivated trivalent influenza vaccine : Fluarix® , Agriflu® , Fluzone® ( 60 pregnant woman 20 non-pregnant woman per group ) . The study begin enrollment least 2 4 study product available . Once enrol , blood sample collect subject receive single 0.5 mL dose assign vaccine . Subjects observe least 15 minute immunization , subject maintain memory aid record oral temperature systemic local adverse event ( AEs ) 8 day immunization . Subjects phone call Day 2 8 review memory aid , concomitant medication assessment , assessment AEs . At approximately Day 28 post-vaccination , subject return clinic blood sample collection , AE concomitant medication assessment , target physical examination ( indicate ) . Pregnant subject also schedule phone call Day 28 time delivery Day 180 , whichever later , assess new-onset chronic medical condition , pregnancy-related problem miscarriage serious adverse event ( SAEs ) since last visit . At approximately Day 180 post-vaccination , subject return clinic blood sample collection assessment receipt vaccine since last visit . Subjects ask new-onset chronic medical condition , SAEs since last visit pregnancy-related problem miscarriage ( pregnant woman cohort ) . The duration study approximately 6 month non-pregnant subject 6-8 month pregnant subject , depend delivery date pregnant woman . Pregnant subject collection maternal cord blood time delivery . Pregnant subject also phone call 1 month delivery ass new-onset chronic medical condition SAEs since last visit . The primary objective evaluate safety single 0.5 mL intramuscular injection 2010-2011 inactivated TIV pregnant woman evaluate immunogenicity 2010-2011 inactivated TIV pregnant woman hemagglutination inhibition assay ( HAI ) . The secondary objective evaluate persistence antibody 2010-2011 inactivated TIV pregnant woman Day 180 ass transfer maternally derive antibody virus 2010-2011 inactivated TIV infant bor
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman : Pregnant female age 18 39 year , inclusive . Is singleton pregnancy 14 weeks/0 day 33 weeks/6 day gestation . Had least one prenatal visit pregnancy confirm . Is good health , determine vital sign [ heart rate < 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) ; blood pressure : systolic < 140 mm Hg ; diastolic less equal 90 mm Hg ; oral temperature < 100 degree Fahrenheit ] , medical history ensure exist medical diagnosis condition stable consider clinically significant , targeted physical examination base medical history . A stable medical condition define health outcome specific disease consider within acceptable limit last 3 month . Intends available 6 month follow receipt 20102011 seasonal influenza vaccine delivery record information obtain , whichever longer . Able understand comply plan study procedure . Provides write informed consent prior initiation study procedure . Agrees sign medical release infant allow study staff gather pertinent medical information pregnancy outcome data , need per clinical site policy . Nonpregnant woman : Female age 1839 year , inclusive . For 30 day prior enrollment 30 day follow receipt 20102011 inactivated trivalent influenza vaccine ( TIV ) study must fulfill one following : ( ) able bear child surgically sterilize ( hysterectomy ) least 1 year status post tubal ligation 1 year postmenopausal ( ii ) agree practice effective method contraception include , limited , abstinence , barrier method ( condom diaphragm ) use spermicide , birth control pill , patch hormonal shot hormonal implant , NuvaRing IUDs ( intrauterine device ) , monogamy vasectomize partner . For female subject childbearing potential , must negative pregnancy test ( urine serum ) within 24 hour prior vaccination . Is good health , determine vital sign , medical history ensure exist medical diagnosis condition stable consider clinically significant , targeted physical examination base medical history ( indicate ) . A stable chronic medical condition define change prescription medication , dose , frequency medication last 3 month health outcome specific disease consider within acceptable limit last 6 month . Any change due change health care provider , insurance company etc , do financial reason , long class medication consider violation inclusion criterion . Any change prescription medication due improvement disease outcome consider violation inclusion criterion . Intends available 6 month follow receipt 20102011 inactivated TIV . Able understand comply plan study procedure . Provides write informed consent prior initiation study procedure . Infants born pregnant woman : Infant age 6 week ( plus/minus 14 day ) , born mother enrol study . Had cord blood sample collect time labor delivery . Parent ( ) /legal guardian ( ) must willing able comply plan study procedure available study visit . Subject and/or parent ( ) /legal guardian ( ) must provide write informed consent prior initiation study procedure . Pregnant woman : Has receive 20102011 trivalent influenza vaccine ( inactivated live ) . Has know allergy hypersensitivity egg , egg protein , latex component vaccine ( include , limited : formaldehyde , polyethylene glycol pisooctylphenyl ether , sucrose , gelatin , polysorbate 80 , kanamycin , polymyxin neomycin ) . Has history severe reaction follow previous immunization influenza virus vaccine . Has receive live license vaccine within 4 week inactivate licensed vaccine within 2 week prior vaccination study plan receipt vaccine within 28 day follow vaccination . Measles , mumps , rubella vaccine tetanus , diphtheria , acellular pertussis vaccine human papillomavirus vaccine permit postpartum . Is enrolled plan enroll another interventional clinical trial investigational product current pregnancy participate study ( observational study allow ) . Has acute illness and/or oral temperature > /= 100.0 degree F , within 72 hour vaccination ( This may result temporary delay vaccination ) . Has immunosuppression result underlie illness treatment , use anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 36 month . Has active neoplastic disease ( exclude nonmelanoma skin cancer ) , history hematologic malignancy , current bleeding disorder , take anticoagulant ( daily aspirin may acceptable ) . Long term use glucocorticoid , include oral parenteral , highdose inhaled steroid ( > 800 mcg/day beclomethasone dipropionate equivalent ) within precede 6 month ( nasal topical steroid allow ) receive betamethasone dexamethasone accelerate fetal lung maturity . Has history receive immunoglobulin blood product ( exception Rhogam ) within 3 month prior enrollment study . Has diagnosis current uncontrolled major psychiatric disorder . Has hospitalize psychiatric illness , history suicide attempt , confinement danger self others , within past 10 year . The subject receiving follow psychiatric drug : aripiprazole , clozapine , ziprasidone , haloperidol , molindone , loxapine , thioridazine , thiothixene , pimozide , fluphenazine , risperidone , mesoridazine , quetiapine , trifluoperazine , trifluopromazine , chlorprothixene , chlorpromazine , perphenazine , olanzapine , carbamazepine , divalproex sodium , lithium carbonate lithium citrate . Subjects receive antidepressant drug ( list ) stable least 3 month prior enrollment without decompensating allow enrollment study . Known active infection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B , hepatitis C. History alcohol drug abuse last 5 year . Has seizure disorder antiseizure medication . Has history GuillainBarré Syndrome . Has acute chronic medical condition , opinion investigator would render vaccination unsafe , would interfere evaluation response ( include , limited , know cardiac disease , chronic hypertension , chronic liver disease , significant renal disease , unstable progressive neurological disorder , transplant recipient diabetes , juvenile diabetes [ Type I ] advanced diabetes renal disease eye disease . Gestational diabetes control diet insulin acceptable ) .
